column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I can't even remember the drinks we got
column2: but all the cocktails we got were so delicious and refreshing. We ordered truffled mac and cheese
column4: filet mignon....oh and the fresh bread they give you. I just can't rave enough. The service from the waiter was on point - he checked in on us frequently
column7: and just really tied the evening together.
